Class NelsonSiegelSvenssonParameters

Namespace
ECBFinanceAPI.Loaders.YieldCurves.Models
Assembly
ECBFinanceAPI.dll

Parameters for the Nelson–Siegel–Svensson (NSS) yield curve model. The NSS model uses a combination of level, slope and two curvature components to fit observed yields across maturities.

public record NelsonSiegelSvenssonParameters : IEquatable<NelsonSiegelSvenssonParameters>

Constructors

NelsonSiegelSvenssonParameters(DateTime, GovernmentBondNominalRating, double, double, double, double, double, double)

Parameters for the Nelson–Siegel–Svensson (NSS) yield curve model. The NSS model uses a combination of level, slope and two curvature components to fit observed yields across maturities.

public NelsonSiegelSvenssonParameters(DateTime Date, GovernmentBondNominalRating GovernmentBondNominalRating, double Beta0, double Beta1, double Beta2, double Beta3, double Tau1, double Tau2)

Parameters

Date DateTime

The date for which the parameters were estimated or observed.

GovernmentBondNominalRating GovernmentBondNominalRating

The nominal rating of the government bond these parameters apply to.

Beta0 double

Long-term level of the yield curve (as maturity → ∞).

Beta1 double

Short-term component; controls the initial slope of the yield curve.

Beta2 double

Medium-term curvature; introduces a hump or dip at intermediate maturities.

Beta3 double

Additional long-term curvature to capture more complex shapes at longer maturities.

Tau1 double

Decay factor for Beta1 and Beta2; determines how quickly their effects diminish with maturity (expressed in years).

Tau2 double

Decay factor for Beta3; controls the influence of the second curvature term over time (expressed in years).

Properties

Long-term level of the yield curve (as maturity → ∞).
